amendment.description: Amendment sought to require Export-Import Bank authorizations above $10 million to be contingent on at least two denials of similar assistance from the private sector and stipulated penalties for making false claims when seeking Bank assistance.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mulvaney amendment (A075) Failed by recorded vote: 124 - 302 (Roll no. 609).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Mulvaney amendment (A075) Failed by recorded vote: 124 - 302 (Roll no. 609).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A075) offered by Mr. Mulvaney.
